```
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    metadata:
      name: nginx-sample
      labels:
        app: nginx
        environment: production
    spec:
      replicas: 2
      selector:
        matchLabels:
          app: nginx
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            app: nginx
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: nginx
            image: nginx:latest
            ports:
            - containerPort: 80
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              runAsNonRoot: true
          restartPolicy: Always
    ```

```
    ---
    #
    # CAUTION: this is an example configuration.
    #          Do not use this for your own cluster!
    #
    apiVersion: apiserver.config.k8s.io/v1
    kind: EncryptionConfiguration
    resources:
    - providers:
      - aesgcm:
          keys:
          - name: key1
            secret: c2VjcmV0IGlzIHNlY3VyZQ==
          - name: key2
            secret: dGhpcyBpcyBwYXNzd29yZA==
      resources:
      - secrets
    ```

```
    # Log secrets access within request and response.
    apiVersion: audit.k8s.io/v1
    kind: Policy
    rules:
    - level: RequestResponse
      resources:
      - resources:
        - secrets
    apiVersion: audit.k8s.io/v1
    kind: Policy
    rules:
    - level: RequestResponse
      resources:
        - group: ""
          resources: ["secrets"]
    ```

```
    apiVersion: v1
    kind: Secret
    metadata:
      name: test
      namespace: test
    type: Opaque
    data:
      password: dGVzdA==
      username: dGVzdA==
    ```
